body: And I don't wanna hear people going "It's just a drawing it's not real" Still doesn't change the fact that you get turned on by little girls getting raped you absolute fucking pigs.

To those who actually fap to this. Fuck you. You are not right in the head, and I hope you fuckin suffer the worst fate possible. Why would you fucking fap to an under aged girl getting raped a brutalized by multiple people? WHAT ABOUT THAT TURNS YOU ON YOU SICK FUCKS!!!
